titleStmt.title: The trve informer who in the following discovrse or colloqvie discovereth unto the vvorld the chiefe causes of the sa[]d distempers in Great Britanny and Ireland / deduced from their originals ; and also a letter writ by Serjeant-Major Kirle to a friend at VVinsor.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Kirle, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing, NUC pre-1956 to Howell.
